hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select pp.user_id userId, CASE WHEN pp.current_score IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pp.current_score END currentScore, CASE WHEN v1.totalRechargeScore IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE v1.totalRechargeScore END totalRechargeScore, CASE WHEN v2.totalGameScore IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE v2.totalGameScore END totalGameScore, CASE WHEN v2.totalSysScore IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE v2.totalSysScore END totalSysScore from player_profile pp left join (select to_player, sum(score) totalRechargeScore from recharge_record group by to_player) v1 on pp.user_id = v1.to_player left join (select user_id, sum(cur_score) totalGameScore, sum(sys_score) totalSysScore from player_score group by user_id) v2 on pp.user_id = v2.user_id

select COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT from player_profile pp left join (select to_player, sum(score) totalRechargeScore from recharge_record group by to_player) v1 on pp.user_id = v1.to_player left join (select user_id, sum(cur_score) totalGameScore, sum(sys_score) totalSysScore from player_score group by user_id) v2 on pp.user_id = v2.user_id
